$comment: Config created by the server and stored in the config root (usually /vagrant/config/) to match keyboards in config.yml (from the server) that are passed through to /dev/input devices

twokeys.description: Contains information about what this config is for

type.description: Tells us this is a KEYBOARD_MAP config.  KEYBOARD_MAP must be given for this value so we know we are parsing the right config

createdBy.description: Tells us who created this config: CONTROLLER means server side, DETECTOR means the detector that runs on the client created this config

keyboards.description: Contains a map of keyboard UUIDs to /dev/input devices
